attributes.additional_details: For the English team and its supporters singing at lease verus 1,2 and 5 of God Save the Queen our national anthem, and if the Scottish do leave the United Kingdom, perhaps verus 6. This country should be proud of itself and its heritage and the English players and supports should be more patriotic. This is both a fantasic way to show support and a rousing sond to fill all English men and women with joy and pride.
